scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --prefix packages/shared-types && npm run build --prefix packages/ai-core
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.check-all: npm run type-check --prefix backend && npm run type-check --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend && npm run lint:fix --prefix backend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix backend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix frontend && npm run format:check --prefix backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --prefix frontend && npm run type-check --prefix backend
scripts.test: npm run test:run --prefix frontend && npm test --prefix backend
